track.name: Hang on Little Tomato
comments: a song very close to my heart.

"•Three tomatoes are walking down the street -- a poppa tomato, a momma tomato, and a little baby tomato. Baby tomato starts lagging behind. Poppa tomato gets angry, goes over to the baby tomato, and squishes him... and says, 'Ketchup.' "  Don't know why I thought of that haha ;)
I like to smoke pot when listening to this song... It's like a lullaby for a serial killer
I need another Pink Martini.... song.
Thanks Nikki nice track very lovely just feeling like lounging on the couch!!
Sounds like a classic tune from one of those black and white movies.
most  pleasurable  to  the  ears  ... absolutely  wonderful  . i  want  more  of  this  ...
Love this every time I hear it - shades of WW2 dance halls, and yet very cool for 2011!
Hallo I am back I was practising
